statements: SELECT * FROM public_procurement_processes WHERE process_id = 1;
SELECT process_name, start_date, end_date FROM public_procurement_processes WHERE bidder_count > 5;
SELECT process_id, process_name FROM public_procurement_processes WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM public_procurement_processes WHERE bidder_count IS NULL;
SELECT process_id, process_name, bidder_count FROM public_procurement_processes WHERE start_date <= '2022-05-01';
SELECT process_id, process_name, start_date, end_date, bidder_count FROM public_procurement_processes WHERE process_id = 1
SELECT * FROM public_procurement_processes ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT process_name, COUNT(*) AS num_processes FROM public_procurement_processes GROUP BY process_name HAVING num_processes > 1
SELECT process_name, start_date, end_date, COUNT(*) AS num_bidders FROM public_procurement_processes WHERE bidder_count > 5 GROUP BY process_name, start_date, end_date
SELECT AVG(bidder_count) AS avg_bidders FROM public_procurement_processes
SELECT * FROM procurement_processes;
SELECT process_name, start_date FROM procurement_processes WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT contract_name, vendor_name, contract_amount FROM contracts WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT process_id, process_name FROM procurement_processes ORDER BY process_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE vendor_name IN ('Vendor A', 'Vendor B');
SELECT * FROM procurement_processes;
SELECT process_id, process_name, start_date FROM procurement_processes WHERE process_id = 1;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, vendor_name, contract_amount FROM contracts WHERE vendor_name = 'Vendor A';
SELECT * FROM procurement_processes WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT contract_name, vendor_name, contract_amount FROM contracts WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY contract_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM procurement_processes;
SELECT process_name, start_date, end_date FROM procurement_processes;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE contract_amount > 10000;
SELECT vendor_name, contract_amount FROM contracts ORDER BY contract_amount DESC;
SELECT department_name, budget FROM departments WHERE location = 'Headquarters';
SELECT * FROM procurement_processes;
SELECT contract_id, vendor_name, contract_amount FROM contracts WHERE contract_amount > 5000;
SELECT process_id, process_name, start_date, end_date, department_id FROM procurement_processes WHERE department_id = 3;
SELECT department_id, department_name, location FROM departments WHERE budget < 100000;
SELECT p.process_id, p.process_name, c.contract_id, c.vendor_name, c.contract_amount FROM procurement_processes p JOIN contracts c ON p.process_id = c.procurement_process_id;
SELECT * FROM public_procurement_processes;
SELECT process_name, start_date, end_date FROM public_procurement_processes WHERE status='active';
SELECT doc_id, doc_name, doc_type FROM procurement_documentation ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT contractor_name, total_amount FROM contracts WHERE total_amount > 100000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT officer_name, department, email FROM procurement_officers WHERE department='Finance'
SELECT id, process_name, start_date, end_date, status FROM public_procurement_processes;
SELECT contractor_name, total_amount, status FROM contracts WHERE total_amount > 10000;
SELECT doc_name, doc_type, created_date, uploaded_by FROM procurement_documentation WHERE doc_type = 'Contract';
SELECT officer_name, department FROM procurement_officers ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT id, process_name, end_date FROM public_procurement_processes WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM bids;
SELECT bid_id, company_name, bid_amount FROM bids WHERE bid_amount > 5000;
SELECT vendor_name, address, contact_person FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT contract_id, start_date, end_date FROM contracts ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT department_name FROM departments WHERE department_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM bids WHERE bid_id = 1;
SELECT company_name, bid_amount FROM bids ORDER BY bid_amount DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, address FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT department_name, vendor_name FROM departments JOIN vendors ON departments.department_id = vendors.vendor_id;
SELECT contract_id, MAX(bid_amount) AS max_bid_amount FROM bids GROUP BY contract_id HAVING MAX(bid_amount) > 5000;
